Reasoning Language Models: A Blueprint

This document provides an overview of Reasoning Language Models (RLMs), including their history, main pillars, and different categories. It also discusses the blueprint for building RLMs, algorithmic formulas, and value and reward models. Additionally, it covers how to use the blueprint for user applications, design of the x1 framework, and example analyses.
